Items.Script: The road to the east led to the castle, but since it was still early in the morning, the robot decided to walk around the village and see what the inhabitants were doing. He was attracted by someone in a black robe.

It was the elder. He goes out every morning to watch the sunrise and see how life begins to boil in the village. The robot asked if he could help the villagers in any way. The elder suggested that the assistant go to the shore and ask the miller and the boatman.

The robot was about to go, but the elder asked to stay a little longer. He was very curious to know a little more about our hero, more precisely, about his mental abilities and ingenuity, and asked a riddle - in which hand does he hold a pebble?
